alert.note: Alert for Custer (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 05 at 7:41PM CDT until June 05 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 AM CDT MONDAY... ...REPLACES FLOOD ADVISORY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Nebraska, including the following county, Custer. * WHEN...Until 130 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 741 PM CDT, Doppler radar and observed rainfall amounts indicate 3 inches or more of rainfall has occurred with some additional rainfall expected. Flooding is likely ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Callaway, Milldale and Finchville. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
